org.taptwo.android.widget
Interface FlowIndicator

All Superinterfaces:
ViewFlow.ViewSwitchListener
All Known Implementing Classes:
CircleFlowIndicator, TitleFlowIndicator
public interface FlowIndicator
extends ViewFlow.ViewSwitchListener

An interface which defines the contract between a ViewFlow and a FlowIndicator.
A FlowIndicator is responsible to show an visual indicator on the total views number and the current visible view.
